text: Szombathelyi KKA is a Hungarian women's handball club. They currently play in the Nemzeti Bajnokság I (NBI), the top level championship in Hungary, after gained promotion in 2019. Since they are sponsored by Hungast Zrt., the official name for the team is Hungast Szombathelyi KKA. == Honours == === Domestic competitions === Nemzeti Bajnokság I/B: * ': 2018–2019 == Team == === Current squad === Squad for the 2020–21 season ;Goalkeepers * Katarina Tomašević * Judit Balog 15px * Kincső Csapó ;Wingers ;LW * Fanni Csire 15px * Adrienn Kozma * Ramóna Franka * Kíra Wald ;RW * Adrienn Orbán * Nikolett Varga ;Line players * Liliia Gorilska * Szabina Mayer * Barbara Szendrei ;Back players ;Left back * Biljana Bandelier * Petra Horváth * Dorina Bíró ;Centre backs * Antónia Tóth * Rebeka Pődör ;Right backs * Noémi Virág * Marija Agbaba === Transfers === : Transfers for the 2020–21 season ;Image:Arrow-up.png Joining * Judit Balog (GK) (from Békéscsabai Előre NKSE) * Adrienn Orbán (RW) (from Kisvárdai KC) * Kincső Csapó (GK) (on loan from Siófok KC) * Marija Agbaba (RB) (from ŽORK Jagodina) * Kíra Wald (LW) (on loan from Siófok KC) ;Image:Arrow-down.gif Leaving * Maja Gadányi (GK) * Flóra Sipeki (GK) (to Moyra-Budaörs Handball) * Nanetta Sárosi (LW) * Dijana Jovetić (RW) * Maja Mayer (LW) === Staff members === * Chairman: Zoltán Pődör * Professional director: Mihály Gódor * Head Coach: György Marosán * Fittness Coach: Tamás Vincze * Masseur: Máté Tóth == Notable former players == * Dijana Jovetić * Flóra Sipeki == Coaches == * György Marosán (2019–) == References == Category:Hungarian handball clubs
title: Szombathelyi KKA
